entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update pyproject and add docker reference by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/45

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: expose jackett provider flags by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/46
  • feat: make --jackett accept optional url and api key by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/47

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6

entry.title: New release for torrra: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump libtorrent-windows-dll from 0.0.2 to 0.0.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/51
  • chore(deps): bump certifi from 2025.6.15 to 2025.7.14 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/52
  • fix: resolve prowlarr magnet uri if redirect by @stabldev in https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/pull/59

Full Changelog: https://github.com/stabldev/torrra/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1
